column5: I took my son out fishing this morning with the rain and cooler temps, and I figured It would turn the fish on and I was right. He caught eight bass with two of them being really nice! All the fish were caught on a light action St Croix rod with 6lb line, a night crawler, small float and hook. We let them all go after quick pics. He really had a hard time holding the fish up for the pictures.
He is certainly off to a good start in his fishing career.
